extendedInfo.description: Pano is an award-winning app that lets you take beautiful, seamless panoramic photos straight from your phone, no other software necessary. Pano has gotten rave reviews from hundreds of thousands of users around the world.... and for a limited time, Pano for Android is ON SALE! Features: - Deliciously simple interface - Take 360-degree panoramas with up to *sixteen* photos - Handy semi-transparent guide helps you line up each shot perfectly - Advanced alignment, blending, and colour-correction algorithms provide seamless images in just seconds - Finished panos save directly to your device - Panos can be resumed if interrupted Please note: Pano does not yet fully support tablets. Tablet support is coming shortly in an update!Be sure to check out our Flickr group to see what people around the world are doing with Pano: http://debaclesoftware.com/flickrContact us for any reason at support@debaclesoftware.comAnd follow us on twitter: @debaclesoftwareWhat the reviewers are saying about Pano for iOS: - MacWorld (4.5/5 stars): "Pano is an amazing app for creating on-the-spot panoramic photos without the need of desktop software to stitch the photos together." -- Tom Hesser.- Webmonkey: "...Pano, a new app for the iPhone, makes taking extreme wide-angle panoramic photographs a total breeze." -- Michael Calore. - iJustine -- "I just want to Pano everything! .. The interface is extremely easy...It works amazing..." - Wired: "Pretty neat -- and a creative way to pass time with your iPhone. The panoramas look quite good considering the iPhone's meager 2-megapixel camera, wouldn't ya say?" -- Brian X. Chen. Awards given to Pano for iOS: - Selected by Apple as one of their "Best Apps of 2009" - Selected by Apple in 2010 as one of the "App Store Essentials Hall of Fame" - Awarded "Best Photography App" in Best App Ever Awards. - Awarded a Top Pick in O'Reilly's "Best iPhone Apps" - Selected by iLounge as one of their "100 Essential iPhone Apps"[ piano ]

reviews.title: Nice but annoying licensing behavior
reviews.comment: Ultra easy to use and gives nice results. But I wish it didn\'t sometimes refuse to work until it can go online and do some kind of licensing thing... since usually when I want to use it, I\'m out of range of 3g and Wi-Fi.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crash crash and crash again!!!
reviews.comment: If you try and stop this POS app it will not let you start over and will just keep crashing over and over.   Then I just want to junk the set.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best panoramic camera
reviews.comment: Tried many others even paid apps but nothing beats to app. It captures views in speedy moves and rendered very well! Great app! If its able to capture 360 degree (sphere) is even cooler!
reviews.author: Sara Yeap

reviews.title: Sweet app!
reviews.comment: It\'s a sweet little app, altho I wish there was a way of turning off the shutter sound!!
reviews.author: Igor Popovic

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Excellent App.
reviews.author: Joseph Tammaro

reviews.title: Rubbish.
reviews.comment: I thought this app would be an improvement of quality over the panorama option I already have on my Samsung S3, I was very wrong. This app doesn\'t show you where your capture starts and end, so the result comes out blurry and collaged. Really do not like this app, total waste of money.
reviews.author: danielle minton

reviews.title: Any chance?
reviews.comment: Any chance of an update that would allow us to make the tiny planets photos I see?
reviews.author: alec miller

reviews.title: Great app!!!
reviews.comment: Just as good if not better than the other higher priced app. You know the one ;)
reviews.author: charles fowler

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: The manual shooting is slow, but the resulting stitched image quality is great!
reviews.author: Alistair Liu

reviews.title: Works too infrequently
reviews.comment: Too many times now one photo in a panorama will be raised or lowered, breaking the smoothness of the entire picture.
reviews.author: Alastair Ward

reviews.title: Not a power users panoramic app
reviews.comment: I cannot get this app to stitch well I always rotate the phone around the nodal point but the stitching looks like crap. I like to take a lot of shots at small increments and this app cannot quite handle that.
reviews.author: Rick Brennan

reviews.title: Great App!!!!
reviews.comment: Love how panoramic picture comes
reviews.author: Leonardo Rosales

reviews.title: Eh...
reviews.comment: Used to take good panoramas on my old droidx and x2.  The Samsung galaxy S4 takes way better panoramas with the built in app.  12X the resolution of this app:-(
reviews.author: Micah Kuiper

reviews.title: Once you get used to it...
reviews.comment: Once you get used to it, it works pretty well. These days, though, a panoramic mode is built in to the camera app of Android 4.  :-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Shame it doesn\'t use compass and gyro
reviews.comment: This app would be fantastic if it used the compass and gyroscope to work out where pictures go rather than the overlap technique
reviews.author: Simon Kirkman

reviews.title: Works great again
reviews.comment: Thanks for the update. No more crashes - excellent.
reviews.author: Lloyd Meyer

reviews.title: great!
reviews.comment: the camera view is kinda \'squished\' on my motorola atrix. used to be fine
reviews.author: Akmal Hisyam

reviews.title: Licensing issue fixed
reviews.comment: Finally fixed licensing issue. Bumped up again to only 4 stars only due to the fact inbuilt camera app has auto scrolling pano functionality which makes it easier to use than this one.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: This is an excellent app.  Very well made.  I love it!
reviews.author: Catherine van der Weele

reviews.comment: Back again to 5 stars!
reviews.author: Natxo N\303\272\303\261ez
